gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 110, Grizzlies 98
gameRecap.excerpt: Miles Bridges led Charlotte with 27 points, six rebounds, and six assists as Vasilije Micic added a career-high 25 points and five 3PT, along with eight assists as Charlotte defeated Memphis, 110-98. Memphis was led by GG Jackson, who totaled 26 points and four rebounds in the loss. Charlotte improves to 17-49 as the Grizzlies move to 23-44.
